definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

sentences.english: The Bartender's primary function involves serving alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages to guests of the Resort.
sentences.chinese: 吧員的主要職責是爲客人提供含酒精和不含酒精飲料。

sentences.english: Assessing risks should not be your main priority.
sentences.chinese: 評估風險大小不應該是你的主要職責。

sentences.english: You see,many of you, not far from now,you will be in influential positions.
sentences.chinese: 你們許多人，不久將會身居要職。

sentences.english: He occupies an important post in government.
Many of the enterprises are employing leading- post retirement premises Board.
sentences.chinese: 該企業更是聘用不少房地局退休領導任要職。

sentences.english: This server's main duty is handling name-related tasks.
sentences.chinese: 此服務器的主要職責是處理名稱相關的任務。

sentences.english: The king conferred the dignity of a peerage on the general.
sentences.chinese: 國王頒賜爵位這要職給將軍。

sentences.english: Ordinary people have always resented the nomenklatura's privileges.
sentences.chinese: 老百姓一直都對要職人員的特權心懷怨恨。

sentences.english: The main responsibilities of the independent quality unit(s) should not be delegated.
sentences.chinese: 獨立的質量部的主要職責不應該委派給他人。

sentences.english: Pai maneuvered himself into a strategic position in Central China and became commander of the government's defense at Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 白崇禧設法混到漢口擔任華中剿匪總司令的要職。

sentences.english: Some went on to occupy prestigious positions in the pharmaceutical industry, health ministry and academia.
sentences.chinese: 這些人戰後繼續在製藥業，衛生部和學術界擔任要職。

sentences.english: Its main functions are facing the class teaching system.
sentences.chinese: 其主要職責是面向全班學生系統授課。

sentences.english: You have a splendid position, but it is your splendid position that makes you so vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 你身居要職，但也正是這顯赫的地位令你不堪一擊。

sentences.english: One of the organization's main jobs has become assigning and overseeing domain names on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 分配和監督互聯網域名已成爲該組織的一個主要職責。

sentences.english: This non-principal part of innovation is an important responsibility for science editors.
sentences.chinese: 非主體的創新是科技編輯的重要職責。

sentences.english: The main role of the Tabardariyya is to guard the Sultan and the palace.
sentences.chinese: 蘇丹禁衛軍主要職責爲保護蘇丹王室及蘇丹宮殿。
